name: Dungeon Crawler (Kate Howell, Joe Ruotolo)
description:
WELCOME TO YOUR OWN DAYCARE DUNGEON

This is our Beta build of Dungeon Crawler, our own take on the popular game genre. 

Your goal during this playtest is to defeat all the goblins and proceed through the every locked door on the other end of the room. 

Thank you to everyone playtesting for us! There are definitely a lot of bugs, so we have included a link to a github for bug reporting!

We have a lot of bug fixing and polishing to do over the next week, including audio implementation! We are looking to get your reaction to the current state of the game, and how it has changed over time.

                                                                                        

link to feedback forum: https://forms.gle/2Chud8Cjmfk5YoHT8

link to bug reporting: https://github.com/crownella/DungeonCrawler

Controls: 

WASD - Movement

Q&E - Switch combat weapons 

F - Interact

SPACE - Jump

R - Restart Level

ESC - Pause
